name: Roguelike Simulator
description:
NetHack is an incredible game.  And an incredible pain in the ass.  It took me like 200 deaths to beat it once.  I have a trophy to prove it.  No, really.

People nowadays don't have the time to learn a game about dying in spectacularly embarrassing ways.  But fear not — I have taken the full NetHack experience and condensed it into only a few minutes.

Can you navigate the dungeon and get out alive?  Probably.

Made in less than a day with bitsy, a very tiny tool for making very tiny games!

See also the brief release announcement.

I don't have the source code anywhere separate, but I think you can just upload the HTML file back into the bitsy editor.
